about_the_game:
This is just a 3D Spot the Difference game! There is nothing special in this game, except pretty girls, accurate models, high-definition screen and sometimes less dress up etc...

Game content

  • 1. High-precision figures of beautiful girls.
  • 2. Two hairstyles.
  • 3. 6 sets of clothes.
  • 4. Ten Play levels.
  • 4. Ten scenes for screenshots.
  • 4. At least ten beautiful BG musics.

Attention

Due to the Unity High Definition Render Pipeline, a setting to limit the frame rate has been added. The actual utilization rate of the 1050 Ti graphics card is about 45%, and there is no pressure at all.

content_descriptors.notes: All the characters are over 18 years old, and the bikini characters appear in level-8 and level-9, which is relatively exposed.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64 位、Windows 8 64 位
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
